artist: Utagawa Kuniyoshi; Published by Iseya Rihei
description: hunched figure wearing tan and turquoise, with bowl-shaped hat, LLQ, walking in the falling snow; cottages below at center on water's edge; water at right; bare tree behind figure
marks: at left and right edges, in black and red: untrans
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
text: Monk Nichiren making his way through the snow up a hillside during his exile on Sado island.
title: In the Snow at Tsukahara, Sado Island
